name: OR_CASE_PREOP_REQS
description: The table contains information from the Pre-op Requirements (I ORC 7695) item.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREOP_REQUIREMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document pre-op requirements that should be performed prior to surgery.
